channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: They’re Making TCP/IP For AI, And It’s Called NANDA
item.description: This is a brand new project that everyone should know about.

item.title: Tech Experiments Are Easy, But Governance Is Looming
item.description: Governance isn’t a trending topic yet, but it will be. And when it hits the front of the queue, many organizations will find themselves unprepared.

item.title: The Future Of Healthcare - AI And Telemedicine’s Expanding Role
item.description: The healthcare sector experiences rapid change because artificial intelligence (AI) and telemedicine technologies transform the entire process of medi...

item.title: ‘Borderlands 4’ Just Moved Its Release Date, Raising ‘GTA 6’ Questions
item.description: What was considered a "safe" spot to launch re: GTA 6, somewhere around the release of Take-Two’s Borderlands 4 on September 23, now perhaps, isn’t.

item.title: I Hate Turn-Based Games, I Love ‘Clair Obscur: Expedition 33’
item.description: If turn-based combat is scaring you away from Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, trust me, you should not let it. It works.
